title: Horrifying moment schoolgirl repeatedly punches defenceless woman in Adelaide
text:
This is the horrifying moment a schoolgirl repeatedly punched a defenceless woman on a sidewalk.

Footage has captured a student savagely assaulting a pedestrian in an attack believed to have occurred in Woodville, in Adelaide's west, 7News reports.

The woman can be heard screaming 'it wasn't me darling' while spectating classmates urge the girl on.

The woman can heard screaming 'it wasn't me darling' while spectating classmates urge the girl on (pictured)

'You're full of s***,' the girl says, ploughing her foot into the woman's stomach.

The assailant begins slapping the woman's head before grabbing her hair and punching her repeatedly.

'Bash her!' another pupil can be heard yelling.

The girl slams her knee into the woman's head, forcing her into the fence behind as she drops to the ground.

Witnesses can be heard laughing until another girl eventually steps in to pull the attacker away.

Earlier that day, the girl was involved in another brutal onslaught only blocks away in Arndale shopping centre.

Earlier that day, the girl was involved in another brutal onslaught only blocks away in Arndale shopping centre (pictured)

A second video has emerged of the culprit pinning a younger girl to the ground lobbing punches into her face.

The victim is sent crashing through tables onto the floor calling as another girl rips a chunk of hair from her head.

Someone intervenes and rips the aggressor away.

It remains unclear who caused the violence.

South Australian police say no reports have been made and are appealing for witnesses to come forward.
description: This is the horrifying moment (pictured) a school girl repeatedly punched a defenceless woman on a sidewalk.
authors: Tita Smith For Daily Mail Australia
